== Secure Nist Attributes - Chuck W. ==
 * [[https://www.oasis-open.org/committees/document.php?document_id=53026&wg_abbrev=kmip|Protecting Security Attributes]]
 * Security Attributes that need protection using custom attributes as guidance
 * Wrap & Unwrap during get or query or upon use by KMS system? Saikat Saha (Saikat)
 * They want to know that attributes are protected at rest and in transit and viewing versus client only access is based on user implementation
 * Attributes that are not to be viewed on server should either be wrapped with key object by device generating or wrapping the key (application implementation issue) - Bob L.
 * Primarily focused at keys in transit an to a smaller extent in storage
 * We can define a mechanism that allows wrapping in a specific way for attributes that require security at rest or in transit as part of the specification, everything else is profile work - Bob L.
